alert.note: Alert for Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 20 at 6:30PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle Nebraska, including the following counties, in panhandle Nebraska, Garden. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 530 PM MST, gauge reports indicated an ice jam. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding near the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lewellen, Ash Hollow State Historical Park, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Ruthon and Eagle Gulch Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
